data.eml:eml: A revision of Nearctic species of the genus Tomoglossa Kraatz, 1856 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gusarov, Vladimir I. (2002): A revision of Nearctic species of the genus Tomoglossa Kraatz, 1856 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae). Zootaxa 30: 1-19, DOI: 10.5072/zenodo.155536
